alert.note: Alert for Grant Grove Area; Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Kings Canyon NP; San Joaquin River Canyon; Sequoia NP; South End of the Upper Sierra; Upper San Joaquin River; Yosemite NP outside of the valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 11 at 4:47AM PDT until April 12 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations 6 to 12 inches above 7,000 feet, with isolated amounts up to 15 inches. Total snow accumulations 3 to 6 inches from 4,000 feet to 7,000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 65 mph along the crest and on exposed ridgetops. * WHERE...Sierra Nevada. * WHEN...Until 5 AM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions may impact the evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Grant Grove Area; Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Kings Canyon NP; San Joaquin River Canyon; Sequoia NP; South End of the Upper Sierra; Upper San Joaquin River; Yosemite NP outside of the valley
